titles: Heauen and earth, religion and policy. Or, The maine difference betweene religion and policy. Written by C.L.
author: Lever, Christopher, fl. 1627.
publisher: Printed by H. B[allard] for Ieffrey Chorlton, and are to be sold at his shop, at the great north dore of Paules Church,
notes: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".
Heading to dedication in seven lines. Variant: heading in eight lines.
Reproduction of the original the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
keywords: Religion and politics --  Early works to 1800.
